title: Disney+ beats subscriber estimates in Q2 2022 while Netflix struggles
content:
Disney reported its fiscal Q2 2022 results on Wednesday with some pretty positive numbers. And when it comes to the Disney+ streaming platform, it beat subscriber expectations for the quarter. This comes as Netflix has been losing users and reconsidering its business model.

moreâ€¦

The post Disney+ beats subscriber estimates in Q2 2022 while Netflix struggles appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: While Netflix has been losing users, Disney+ announced its fiscal Q2 2022 results and it beat subscriber estimates.
